title: 📝 Daily Summary — Feb 20, 2026
content:
# **February 20, 2026**

## What We Built

### Mission Control
- **TikTok Dashboard** with Scripts + Videos sub-tabs
  - Created `tiktok_scripts` Supabase table + `/api/tiktok/scripts` CRUD route
  - Scripts tab: status lanes (Draft/Review/Ready/Sent), drag-drop cards, filters
  - Videos tab: Runway Gen4.5 video generation interface
  - Seeded 7 initial scripts
  - "Send to Phone" integration via Telegram API (text + video support)
- **Sentry Dashboard** component + `/api/sentry/route.js`
  - Added 🛡️ Sentry tab to VIEW_TABS
  - Connected to Sentry project "stratify" (org: jeff-thompson-uy, project ID: 4510920320811008)
- **Skills endpoint** (`/api/skills/last30days`) — rewrote to call Claude API directly (OpenClaw gateway unreachable from Vercel serverless)

### Stratify
- **LiveChart.jsx** — TradingView Lightweight Charts v5 with Twelve Data WebSocket live candle streaming
  - Replaced static charts across multiple pages
  - Persistent interval + visible range across tab navigation
  - Integrated on Trade tab (WatchlistPage)
- **Highcharts Stock chart** with GUI toolbar on Community page
  - Intervals, search, candle color picker, drawing tools (trend lines, horizontal/vertical lines, fibonacci, parallel channel)
  - Persistent chart prefs to localStorage (interval, candle theme, symbol)
  - Navigator with green grip handles, zoom controls, Y-axis drag-to-scale
  - Shooting stars background animation with constant speed, tail-to-head fadeout
- **EconomicsCalendarPage.jsx** — dedicated page using FairEconomy free API (`ff_calendar_thisweek.json`)
  - Shows CPI, Fed, NFP, GDP events with impact levels
  - Added "Calendar" sidebar item in Dashboard.jsx
  - Fixed height overflow, contained within page
- **Restored original AnalyticsPage.jsx** (596 lines) from git history
  - Portfolio performance metrics: Total P&L, Win Rate, Sharpe Ratio, Max Drawdown, Monthly Returns, Trade Distribution, Strategy Performance
  - Sub-agent had incorrectly replaced analytics with stock charting — now back to portfolio metrics
- **War Room prefetch** — auto-fires top 3 scans (Market Movers, Earnings, SPY) in parallel on mount
  - 30-min cache TTL for instant revisit data
  - Shows "Loading latest intel..." during prefetch

## What We Fixed

### Stratify
- **Removed green UI elements** per permanent design rules:
  - Green plus icon from TradePage search results (commit `9a71990`)
  - Green "+Add" button from WatchlistPage search bar (commit `7f6767c`)
- **Economic calendar height overflow** in FredPage (commit `aabe9d0`) — now contained
- **Chart bottom cutoff** — removed navigator, flex-shrink-0 interval bar, forced flex-row layout
- **Gray screen issues** — lazy-loaded TradePage and AnalyticsPage to prevent Highcharts from crashing login
- **Circular import** — extracted stock database to shared file (commit `49afbf8`)
- **Economic calendar CORS** — proxied through Vercel to avoid CORS errors
- **Sentry SDK** — installed `@sentry/react`, initialized in `main.jsx`
- **Main bundle size** — removed ALL Highcharts from main bundle to fix gray screen (commits `2ac2460`, `b6b5030`)
- **Repo visibility** — restored after visibility change, triggered Vercel redeploy

### Mission Control
- **Skills endpoint** — fixed by calling Claude API directly instead of trying to reach OpenClaw gateway from serverless function

## Key Decisions

### Architecture
- **FairEconomy API for economic calendar** — Twelve Data `earnings_calendar` paywalled on current plan, FairEconomy provides free CPI/Fed/NFP/GDP events
- **AnalyticsPage = portfolio metrics, NOT stock charting** — portfolio win rate, Sharpe, drawdown vs. individual stock technical analysis
- **Per-user analytics preferences table removed** — not needed for original portfolio metrics page
- **TradingView Lightweight Charts over Highcharts for live data** — better WebSocket integration, lighter weight

### Design Direction
- **NO pill/bubble backgrounds on buttons or labels** — permanent UI rule, plain colored text only
- **NO green box buttons** — minimal/outline style only
- **Icons: outline only** — `fill="none" stroke={color} strokeWidth={1.5}` (Folder icon exception: `fillOpacity={0.2}`)
- **Theme:** "premium, alive, animated, modern, dark"

### Deployment
- **Always push to GitHub, never local deploy** — Stratify deploys via Vercel on git push
- **Never mock data** — always use real APIs (Alpaca, Twelve Data, Supabase)

## Important Info

### Sentry (Stratify Monitoring)
- **Project:** stratify
- **Org:** jeff-thompson-uy
- **Project ID:** 4510920320811008
- **Blocked:** Dashboard needs `SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN` in Mission Control Vercel env vars (Issue & Event→Admin, Organization→Read permissions) — Jeff was creating token

### API Keys
- **Twelve Data Pro Plan:** $29/mo, API key `b15d4a864f04401085fae2baa50de1b5`
  - 1,597 API/min + 1,500 WebSocket credits, no daily limits
  - 75 global exchanges, 100+ server-side technical indicators
  - WebSocket: `wss://ws.twelvedata.com/v1/quotes/price`
- **Runway ML (Video Gen):** Key in `third-brain/2026-02-19-runway-api-key.md`, Org: 72a8426f-5b14-4a1d-ba91-bc2d5ce0df41
- **Anthropic API Key:** Required in Mission Control Vercel env vars for Skills endpoint

### Supabase Tables (Mission Control)
- `tiktok_scripts` — id, title, hook, body, cta, status (draft/review/ready/sent), tags, video_url, created_at, updated_at

### Commit Activity
- **Stratify:** 67 commits today (LiveChart, Highcharts, chart persistence, Economics Calendar, Analytics restoration, Sentry, UI cleanup)
- **Second Brain (cron):** 13 commits today (x-engagement, market-intel, trade-log, trump-intel)

## Notes

### Blocked Items
- **Sentry dashboard:** Waiting on `SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN` from Jeff
- **Skills endpoint:** Needs `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` in Mission Control Vercel env vars

### Next Steps
- Jeff decides whether to enhance AnalyticsPage with Highcharts or keep CSS-based version
- Finish Sentry token setup (Issue & Event→Admin, Organization→Read permissions)
- Add `SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN` + `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` to Mission Control Vercel env vars
- Wire TikTok cron agents to auto-save scripts to `tiktok_scripts` table
- Verify LiveChart WebSocket live candle updates on deployed site

### Market Intel Highlights (Auto-scanned 5x today)
- **Bitcoin:** Worst 50-day start to a year on record, near $68K, "extreme fear" dominates sentiment
- **Trump tariffs:** Supreme Court struck down sweeping tariffs, Trump immediately announced NEW 10% global tariff under Section 122
- **CRWD/NET:** Dropped ~10% on misguided Claude AI code review fears (WSB calling it "most misguided dump in a long time")
- **Stablecoin regulation:** White House favors some stablecoin rewards, CLARITY bill has 90% chance by April (Ripple CEO)
- **Dubai:** $16B tokenized real estate via XRP Ledger, secondary market live
- **AI:** Google Gemini 3.1 Pro launch, NVIDIA/OpenAI pivot from $100B deal to $30B investment
- **Olympics:** USA vs Canada men's hockey gold medal game Sunday

### Tech Stack Evolution
- **Charts:** TradingView Lightweight Charts v5 (live data) + Highcharts Stock (advanced GUI)
- **Monitoring:** Sentry for error tracking
- **Data:** Twelve Data WebSocket for live quotes/candles
- **Deployment:** Vercel (stratify-black.vercel.app)
- **Frontend:** React 19, Vite 5, TailwindCSS, Lucide icons
- **Backend:** Supabase (PostgreSQL), Alpaca API, Claude API

---

**Session Duration:** Full day (00:01 AM - 11:00 PM ET)  
**Commits:** 67 (Stratify) + 13 (Second Brain cron jobs)  
**Major Features:** TikTok Dashboard, Sentry integration, LiveChart + Highcharts, Economics Calendar, Analytics restoration
